notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, M.-R.B.; methodology, M.-R.B. and A.A.S.-Z.; validation, M.-R.B. and R.-A.M.; formal analysis, C.G.U., E.V., R.-A.M., M.F.; investigation, M.-R.B., A.A.S.-Z. and C.G.U.; resources: electrodes manufacturing—M.-R.B., cell assembly—A.A.S.-Z., electrochemical testing—C.G.U., SEM-EDAX, TEM-EDAX, XRD—E.V., TGA—R.-A.M., XPS—M.F., F.N.; writing—original draft preparation, M.-R.B., R.-A.M., E.V., M.F.; writing—review and editing, M.-R.B., R.-A.M.; supervision, M.-R.B., A.A.S.-Z.; project administration, M.-R.B.; funding acquisition, M.-R.B. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
